title: URF
body: Why do we have nexus siege again yet we havn't had urf for almost a month or 2 now like wtf

replies.body:
I believe it is because Nexus Seige is a new mode. Before the rotating game mode queue, all new modes would be playable for two weeks. They're likely extending that concept to the rotating mode.

It's probably about time for URF though lol. It's not even on the schedule currently which means we'll have to wait at least another month. Personally I hate the mode, but being absent for 3 months is a little too much IMO.
